Text:
For some reason I don't count as a seeder? 

It still shows 0 seeders even though I just made and uploaded the torrent and it's there in uTorrent, supposedly seeding but the TPB doesn't update?
Nevermind, I guess it works after all...

Just one question before i start downloading : 
It contains ALL DLC's !?  ^^

So far :) It contains:
Benedict Arnold DLC
Lost Mayans Ruins Mission
New colours for the Aquila
Upgraded Naval Convoy
Scotish Flintlock
Boarding Axe
Pirate Flintlock
Obawandiyag's War Club
Traditional Colonial Assassin Outfit
Ezio's Outfit
Captain of the Aquilla's Uniform
"Sinking a Secret" privateer contract
"Ghost War" privateer contracts
The Tyranny of King Washington - Infamy 
The Tyranny of King Washington - Betrayal 
The Tyranny of King Washington - Redemption

Pretty much, yes :) 

Here's a list of all the DLCs: http://assassinscreed.wikia.com/wiki/Assassin%27s_Creed_III_downloadable_content

If you can check the info provided, all of them are there (I think). Too bad only magnet links work, you could download just the DLCs off the pack if you had the game allready installed :)

dragancla: Thanks a lot for your effort, i appreciate it a lot. Hope it works. I will download, instal and report back.

Once again thank you very much dragancla.
